headline: Trimble Machine Control Now Integrates with Vermeer Remote Control Pile Drivers to Deliver Greater Automation on Solar Farm Jobsites
summary: Vermeer and Trimble® today announced the addition of the Trimble Groundworks machine control system to the Vermeer PD10R and PD25R remote control pile drivers. This system represents a significant step forward in machine automation, improving productivity in the construction of solar farms.
